casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Vincent Brady ALLEN. No. 531P02-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Vincent B. Allen, Pro Se. Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st day of May 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."
